```{r fit_poisson}

mod <- glm(data=ohio_canc, Obs ~ 1, offset=log(Exp), family="quasipoisson")
kappaest <- kappaval(Obs, mod$fitted, mod$df.resid)
nMC <- 1000
ncts <- length(Exp)
yMC <- matrix(rpois(n=nMC * ncts, lambda=Exp),
              nrow=ncts, ncol=nMC)
kappaMC <- NULL

for (i in 1:nMC) {
  modMC <- glm(yMC[,i] ~ 1, offset=log(Exp),
               family="quasipoisson")
  kappaMC[i] <- kappaval(yMC[,i], modMC$fitted,
               modMC$df.redis)
}

```
